reg:regulation.reg:title: BC Online Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 211/2015, November 28, 2016]

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: When money can be collected and retained by operator other than government

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 3 (2) (a) of the BC Online Act, an operator of BC Online other than the government may collect money payable to the government or to a public officer for a service or information if both of the following apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the money is payable to the government or to a public officer under an Act listed in the Schedule, or a regulation under the Act;
the Act or regulation describes the money in any of the following ways:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: the money is payable to the operator;
the money is an operator fee or operator charge;
the money is payable, under the Environmental Management Act or a regulation under that Act, to the electronic data distributor.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 3 (2) (a) of the BC Online Act, an operator of BC Online other than the government may retain the whole or a part of money payable to the government or to a public officer for a service or information if both of the following apply:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the operator may collect the money under subsection (1);
an agreement referred to in section 2 (1) of the BC Online Act authorizes the operator to retain the whole or the part of the money.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: When money can be collected and retained by government as operator
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 3 (2) (b) of the BC Online Act, if the government is the operator of BC Online, money payable for a service or information under an Act listed in the Schedule, or a regulation under the Act, is payable to the government as operator of BC Online if the Act or regulation describes the money in any of the following ways:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the money is payable to the operator;
the money is an operator fee or operator charge;
the money is payable, under the Environmental Management Act or a regulation under that Act, to the electronic data distributor.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: BC Online Act, S.B.C. 1998, c. 24, section 3 (2) (a) and (b)]
